featured.text: Picking up on teens' interest in computer games, Hilfiger sponsored a Nintendo competition and installed Nintendo terminals in his stores.

definition.zh_def: 任天堂是一家日本的電子遊戲公司，以開發和發行遊戲機及遊戲而聞名。
definition.en_def: Nintendo is a Japanese video game company known for developing and publishing gaming consoles and games.
definition.example: I love playing Mario games on my Nintendo Switch.
